attrs.name: modelValue
attrs.desc: default color. When is empty will is transparent

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: It can also take over control power by a user. And you can use it to force control color-picker panel visible or not.

events.name: confirm
events.desc: Event triggered when the user clicks on the confirm

events.name: cancel
events.desc: The Event is triggered when the user clicks on the cancel. When click outside, the cancel event will triggered too.
